players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice was killed. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Vote her out, Bob."
You: "I agree with Charlie. Diana is mafia. Vote her out."
Diana: "I didn't kill Alice; maybe Bob did. Charlie, you might be the detective but maybe you misidentified me. Vote Bob."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia, he killed Alice and is lying about Diana."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Alice was killed by mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "Bob, maybe you are the detective. But you can't be, because Charlie is the detective. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice was killed. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Vote her out, Bob."
Bob: "I agree with Charlie. Diana is mafia. Vote her out."
Diana: "I didn't kill Alice; maybe Bob did. Charlie, you might be the detective but maybe you misidentified me. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I think Charlie is mafia, he killed Alice and is lying about Diana."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Alice was killed by mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "Bob, maybe you are the detective. But you can't be, because Charlie is the detective. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
